description: This is a nice 14.39km that can be done in classic or skate. The trail start from the P10 with a small halt at the Huron Shack for a snack. The first +- 4km is high in intensity and after all, the trail start to be more level with a couple of up and down hill.
directions: From Ottawa or Gatineau:- Take Autoroute 5N to Maniwaki;- Take exit 12 for Chemin Old Chelsea and turn left;- Continue onto Chemin du Lac Meech;- Turn left onto Chemin Dunlop;- Turn right on P10.
title: Gatineau Park - P10 / Fortune / #3 / #1 / Champlain / Fortune
